name: Free Jigsaw Puzzle: Challenging Cool Puzzle Games
name_original: Free Jigsaw Puzzle: Challenging Cool Puzzle Games
description:
Free fun games for kids and adults, is an awesome brain teaser challenge you would love. A beautifully designed free jigsaws collection, an adventure to Caribbean island to hunt hidden gold treasure with Captain Hawk & his merry band of Pirates and play some fun games during the journey.
Join beautiful jigsaws pieces in your quest for gold. Challenges of bombs and mines on the way makes journey adventurous.
A family-friendly fun game to play that caters to a wide age group of audience. It lets you relive your fantasy of being a pirate, sailing in the high seas to a Treasure Island with this puzzle maker.
So, buckle yourself for the voyage of a lifetime with the daring Captain Hawk and his merry band of pirates as they embark on a quest to find hidden treasures. On this voyage, you will encounter several intriguing jigsaw puzzles with increasing levels of complexity. You will have to brave your way past a gigantic octopus, humble tribes of nomads and a cheerful dragon before you can eventually lay claim to the greatest treasure of ‘em all! With 64 puzzles waiting to be unlocked, gear up for an exciting experience. You are in for hours and hours of guaranteed fun!
Are you ready for this Cowboys games !
Unlimited fun for hours while playing Jigsaw puzzles games.
